# title

**Instance Property**

The title of the chart.

## Declaration

```swift
var title: String? { get set }
```

## Specifying the chart title

- **attributedTitle**: An attributed version of the chart title.

items.description: An attributed version of the chart title.
items.name: attributedTitle

title: title
